usage.cn: 回忆是非常美好的事，只要你能让过去的都过去。
usage.eng: memory is a wonderful thing if you don't have to deal with the past。

usage.cn: 我装作一切都无所谓，虽然我已心力交瘁。
usage.eng: I acted like it wasn't a big deal, when really it was breaking my heart

usage.cn: 生活总是会发一些糟糕的牌给我们, 但是我们必须尽自己最大的努力去玩好这些差牌, 并且我们可以玩赢。 ——吴奕辉 菲律宾著名华裔企业家, 誉为菲律宾的李嘉诚
usage.eng: Life will always deal us with a few bad cards, but have to play those cards the best we can, and we can play to win.

usage.cn: 我觉得生命是一种礼物,我不想浪费它,你不知道下一手牌会是什么,要学会接受生活。——Titanic
usage.eng: I figure life is a gift and I don't intend on wasting it. You never know what hand you're going to get dealt next. You learn to take life as it comes at you.
